label: uncl6347
comment: Code qualifying the usage of a currency.

values.label: Charge payment currency
values.comment: The currency in which charges are to be paid.

values.label: Reference currency
values.comment: The currency applicable to amounts stated. It may have to be converted.

values.label: Target currency
values.comment: The currency which should be used to the target destination of the transaction.

values.label: Transport document currency
values.comment: Currency applicable to amounts stated in a transport document/message.

values.label: Calculation base currency
values.comment: Currency on which the calculation is based.

values.label: Information Currency
values.comment: Additional currency the message recipient needs for information purposes. The actual message amount(s) is/are not based upon this currency.

values.label: Currency of the account
values.comment: Currency in which the account is held.
